#+TITLE: French Verb Drill: Professional Terminology
#+AUTHOR: Generated by verbiste.el
#+STARTUP: overview

* Introduction

This drill focuses on modern business and professional verbs.
Practice conjugating these verbs in different tenses and using them in sentences.

* Verbs in this group

1. mutualiser
2. viabiliser
3. responsabiliser
4. tiser
5. solidariser
6. optimiser
7. rentabiliser
8. digitaliser
9. implémenter
10. réinventer

* Example Sentences

- L'entreprise mutualise les ressources. (The company pools resources.)
- Ils viabilisent le projet. (They make the project viable.)
- Le manager responsabilise son équipe. (The manager empowers his team.)

* Conjugation Drills

** mutualiser

*** Present Tense

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |

|-----------+------------|
